item.description:
Come and Watch Downtown Portsmouth NH transformed into a high-speed race course for world class cyclists!!!


http://www.portsmouth...

Hello Everyone come and watch this Elite pro cycling event on the Streets of downtown Portsmouth NH.. It is always an unforgettable event..

There are races for children in the morning, a Pancake breakfast at 9am, and the Pro Racing begins at Noon time... I am going to put the Link for the Portsmouth Criterium Website right here... I am actually a volunteer and will be working at the VIP tent right next to the Outdoor Cafe at Popovers, which happens to be the best and most comfortable spot to watch the races...

In addition, from 11am- 5pm Market Street is closed down with the Life Style Expo so during breaks in the race you can walk around and check out vendors that sell products for Healthy Life Styles..

The Streets will be shut down at 7am...so the best place to park is the Hanover Street parking garage it is $3 for the day... Same place our group met for a few bike rides last year... another alternative is the Citizens Bank Parking lot right off of Pleasant St.

Below is the schedule and I can assure you it is a great time... For those attending the best place to meet is Popovers on Market Square.. and to insure a seat I would recommend getting there by Noon time if not sooner!!!

If you have children you may want to enter them in the children's races which begin at 11am.  The kids love it, and they are adorable.

By the Way if you can't spend the day (which I highly recommend you do) the BEST race to see is the one at 3:45 these guys are "The Best of the Best"

http://www.portsmouth...

I will be volunteering all day at the VIP booth which will be located right next to Popover's please come on by to say hello or introduce yourself.  Enjoy this fun event.

7:00 am
Street closures start/Course set-up begins

8:30-10:00 am
Kid's Race Registration
Bank of America Parking Lot



10:30 am
Race Registration opens
Bank of America Parking Lot 11:00 am
Kids Races begin
Congress St. & Maplewood Ave.
11:00 am
LifeStyle Expo opens
Market Street
12:00 pm
Men's Cat 4 Race begins
Market Square
1:00 pm
Men's Cat 3 Race begins
Market Square 2:00 pm
Community Challenge Race begins
Market Square 2:45 pm
Women's Pro/1/2/3 Race begins
Market Square 3:45 pm
Men's Pro/1/2 Race begins
Market Square
item.how_to_find_us: This is not an official meetup because I am volunteering at the VIP tent..but it's a great event to watch especially if you are a cycling enthusiast, so I wanted to make sure you all knew about it. If you want to meetup I would recommend Popovers.s.
item.name: Smutty Nose Brewing Company presents the 7th Annual Portsmouth Criterium
